EmailTemplate.name: WBN-202202-EMP-OTH-HWBR-Q2-NATIONAL-BROKER.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Don't forget to register for our broker webinar on mental health care
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
JOIN US Understanding and bridging gaps in your clients’ mental health care offerings
May 17 | 2 p.m. Eastern
Image Mature woman waving at tablet
Set yourself up for success when you join our webinar, where you'll learn more about the current challenges your clients are facing with mental health care, and how our solutions can help provide optimal care across the member population.
Watch and win Webinar attendees will be automatically entered into a raffle to win a pair of Ray-Ban sunglasses, and the winner will be announced live at the end of the event. It’s coming up fast so register today!
Register now <[[https://teladochealth.com/broker-webinar/]]>
About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
